creator: dhc4z@virginia.edu
text:
fresh lenya 1.4 install from svn and I can't see the site tree under the "Site"
tab.  Here is the problem (from FireFox JavaScript Console):

Error: syntax error
Source File:
http://localhost:8888/default/info-authoring/features.html?lenya.usecase=info-overview&lenya.step=showscreen
Line: 18, Column: 36
Source Code:
loadSynchPage('/default/info-authoring/features.html');

I will add the patch that worked for me...

creator: dhc4z@virginia.edu
text:
Created attachment 14199
use xml serializer instead of xhtmlSerializer

I used the XHTML Serializer (xml serializer) like the cocoon documentation
http://cocoon.apache.org/2.1/userdocs/serializers/xhtml-serializer.html

instead of using the XHTMLSerializer.
